shortDescription: Triggered when the mouse is moved, or if a screen touch was moved.

arguments.name: dx
arguments.description: The amount moved along the x-axis since the last time mousemoved was triggered.

arguments.name: dy
arguments.description: The amount moved along the y-axis since the last time mousemoved was triggered.

arguments.name: istouch
arguments.description: True if the mouse move originated from a touchscreen touch-move.
